name: data-card-20
effect: Records the number of times the trainer has come in last place overall in the Pokéathlon over wireless.
short_effect: Records the number of times the trainer has come in last place overall in the Pokéathlon over wireless.

flavor_text.black-white: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many Link Pokéathlon losses you’ve had.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many Link Pokéathlon losses you’ve had.
